application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Oak - 2m Holistic crown reduction to prevous points & deadwood. T.2 Silver Birch - Lateral reduction to suitable growth points providing 2m clearance from building.T.3 Hawthorn - 3m Pollard and sever ivy at base.
